answers.answer: I'm not sure I have any good advice, but have they checked you for preeclampsia? Just try to think of the positive things, maybe take a warm bubble bath when you get stressed..

Have you taken your blood pressure when ur not stressed and at home?  I do it all the time just to check and make sure.  At the doctors my bp is usually 130 over 80 but when I'm at home it is always 110 over 60.  Usually it will be higher at the doctors cause you get stressed out there.

question: Alright I'm 29 weeks and 4 days and lately I have been so stressed to the point where every time I go to the doctor my blood pressure is high. Everything annoys me and I'm just so irritable lately. Someone please give me some stress relief tips. I'm only 19 I shouldn't be so stressed.
title: tell me im not alone
